ns9:component-version-script.script:
Import-Module servermanager ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # Import certificate into local certificate store write-output "[1] Importing resource certificate into local certificate store" certutil -p $RESOURCE_CERT_PASSWORD -importpfx $RESOURCE_CERT_URL ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # Make the DNS server entry write-output "[2] Setting the DNS to $DNS_SERVER_IP" $wmi = Get-WmiObject win32_networkadapterconfiguration -filter "ipenabled = 'true'" $wmi.SetDNSServerSearchOrder($DNS_SERVER_IP) 2>&1 >> $null ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # install the IIS role write-output "[3] Installing the IIS Web Server role" Add-WindowsFeature Web-Server ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## write-output "[4] Enabling PowerShell Remoting" # Enable-PSRemoting -Confirm:$false
Write-output "[4.1] Configuring basic authentication" set-item wsman:localhost\Service\Auth\basic true
Write-output "[4.2] Configuring Encryption" set-item wsman:localhost\Service\AllowUnencrypted true set-item wsman:localhost\Client\AllowUnencrypted true
Write-output "[4.3] Configuring remote shell" set-item wsman:localhost\Shell\MaxShellsPerUser 10 set-item wsman:localhost\Shell\MaxConcurrentUsers 10
Write-output "[4.4] Configuring remote hosts" set-item wsman:localhost\Client\TrustedHosts $VCO_SERVER_IP -force ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## ## use custom task join_domain to add this node to domain

@ECHO OFF cd c:\ADFSAutomation
ECHO Checking domain membership FOR /f "tokens=2 delims= " %%a IN ('systeminfo ^| find "Domain:"') DO set dom=%%a IF %dom%==WORKGROUP ( ECHO This node is not a member of a domain, exiting... ECHO Use the domain join custom task to add this node to domain exit /b 1 ) ELSE ( echo member of domain %dom% )
echo Starting ADFS setup %ADFS_SETUP% /quiet /LogFile "C:\ADFSAutomation\logs\ADFS_Setup.log"
IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( echo ERROR: ADFS setup failed with %ERRORLEVEL% echo The ADFS setup logs can be found in the deployed vm at echo C:\ADFSAutomation\logs\ADFS_Setup.log exit /b 1 ) ELSE ( echo ADFS setup completed successfully )

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2
@echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2

ns9:component-version-script.script:
Import-Module servermanager ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # Import certificate into local certificate store write-output "[1] Importing resource certificate into local certificate store" certutil -p $RESOURCE_CERT_PASSWORD -importpfx $RESOURCE_CERT_URL ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # Make the DNS server entry write-output "[2] Setting the DNS to $DNS_SERVER_IP" $wmi = Get-WmiObject win32_networkadapterconfiguration -filter "ipenabled = 'true'" $wmi.SetDNSServerSearchOrder($DNS_SERVER_IP) 2>&1 >> $null ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # install the IIS role write-output "[3] Installing the IIS Web Server role" Add-WindowsFeature Web-Server ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## write-output "[4] Enabling PowerShell Remoting" # Enable-PSRemoting -Confirm:$false
Write-output "[4.1] Configuring basic authentication" set-item wsman:localhost\Service\Auth\basic true
Write-output "[4.2] Configuring Encryption" set-item wsman:localhost\Service\AllowUnencrypted true set-item wsman:localhost\Client\AllowUnencrypted true
Write-output "[4.3] Configuring remote shell" set-item wsman:localhost\Shell\MaxShellsPerUser 10 set-item wsman:localhost\Shell\MaxConcurrentUsers 10
Write-output "[4.4] Configuring remote hosts" set-item wsman:localhost\Client\TrustedHosts $VCO_SERVER_IP -force ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## ## use custom task join_domain to add this node to domain

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2

task.content:
Import-Module servermanager ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # Import certificate into local certificate store write-output "[1] Importing resource certificate into local certificate store" certutil -p $RESOURCE_CERT_PASSWORD -importpfx $RESOURCE_CERT_URL ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # Make the DNS server entry write-output "[2] Setting the DNS to $DNS_SERVER_IP" $wmi = Get-WmiObject win32_networkadapterconfiguration -filter "ipenabled = 'true'" $wmi.SetDNSServerSearchOrder($DNS_SERVER_IP) 2>&1 >> $null ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## # install the IIS role write-output "[3] Installing the IIS Web Server role" Add-WindowsFeature Web-Server ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## write-output "[4] Enabling PowerShell Remoting" # Enable-PSRemoting -Confirm:$false
Write-output "[4.1] Configuring basic authentication" set-item wsman:localhost\Service\Auth\basic true
Write-output "[4.2] Configuring Encryption" set-item wsman:localhost\Service\AllowUnencrypted true set-item wsman:localhost\Client\AllowUnencrypted true
Write-output "[4.3] Configuring remote shell" set-item wsman:localhost\Shell\MaxShellsPerUser 10 set-item wsman:localhost\Shell\MaxConcurrentUsers 10
Write-output "[4.4] Configuring remote hosts" set-item wsman:localhost\Client\TrustedHosts $VCO_SERVER_IP -force ## ---------------------------------------------------------- ## ## use custom task join_domain to add this node to domain
@ECHO OFF del c:\ADFSAutomation\lib\ADFSAutomation.jar copy %automation_jar% c:\ADFSAutomation\lib ECHO ADFS Automation jar updated
